name: SMYS (Game Development)
tagline: Game Development of Siddiq Sazzad Where built Games & Softwares
body:
###Game Development 
We started this **Game Development** at 2015 created by [Siddiq Sazzad](http://siddiqsazzad.github.io/siddiqsazzad001.github.io/)

![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CU05S1-XAAELhra.png)

###Siddiq Sazzad
![](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/672350185620541441/h4LLtgBh_400x400.jpg)
Pogrammer,Gamer,Super User,HTML,CSS,Java Script,Webpage Maker.
 
**Hello**Guys Me the Leader Of this Team.My Team has a **Game Development**.Our Team Other Name **Smys Live** You can Follow us at [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Smys_Live).
You Can Also [Email Us](smyslive@xbox.com)

###Gaming Graphics

![](https://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/logopedia/images/3/32/Nvidia_Logo_Horizontal.svg/revision/latest?cb=20150131182255)

Visual computing technology from [NVIDIA](https://www.nvidia.com/): inventor of the GPU, which creates interactive graphics on Desktop or Laptop.



###Unity 3D

![](http://zpdev.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/unitylogo.png)

Unity is the ultimate game development platform. Use Unity to build high-quality 3D and 2D games which is we use for Games. 

We grow Our Games at The Future Of [Bangladesh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bangladesh)
